item.title: ACSS Surveillance Processor (STC ST02053LA) Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) Functionality – ADS-B Guidance Display (AGD)(EFB Installed)

numlitem.para: Procedures do not require its use, and
Merging & Spacing and CAVS operations are prohibited.
Merging & Spacing and CAVS operations are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard ADS-B Guidance Display (AGD) "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
